service.service_embed: <object type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="{w}" height="{h}" data="http://www.veoh.com/static/swf/webplayer/WebPlayer.swf"> <param name="movie" value="http://www.veoh.com/static/swf/webplayer/WebPlayer.swf"> <param name="flashvars" value="permalinkId={serviceVAL}&videoAutoPlay={ap10}"> <param name="allowfullscreen" value="true"> <param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always"> <param name="allownetworking" value="all" /> </object>
